resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2421</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Endocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Endocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Endocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Endocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Endocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Endocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Endocytosis</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the the passage of materials through the cell membrane by endocytosis, and the part played by membrane receptors in this process.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell membrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den Durchgang der Materialien
durch die Zelle Membrane durch endocytosis zeigt und das Teil spielten
durch Membrane Empfänger in diesem Prozeß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre le le passage des 
matériaux par la membrane de cellules par endocytosis, et la pièce 
ont joué par des récepteurs de membrane dans ce processus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstrasse o a passagem dos 
materiais através da membrana da pilha pelo endocytosis, e a peça 
jogaram pelos receptors da membrana neste processo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il passaggio dei 
materiali tramite la membrana delle cellule dal endocytosis e la parte
hanno giocato dai ricevitori della membrana in questo processo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη μετάβαση των υλικών
μέσω της μεμβράνης κυττάρων από το endocytosis, και το ρόλο 
που παίζεται από τους δέκτες μεμβρανών σε αυτήν την διαδικασία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra el paso de 
materiales a través de la membrana de la célula por endocytosis, y 
la pieza jugaron por los receptores de la membrana en este proceso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle Membrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cellule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">membrane de cellules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pilha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">membrana da pilha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cellula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">membrana delle cellule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύτταρο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεμβράνη κυττάρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">célula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">membrana de la célula</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

        </educational>

        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
